name: Sky-High Fiber Honey Toast
description: Indulge in a delightful and nutritious start to your day with our Sky-High Fiber Honey Toast! Perfect for those seeking a low-sugar yet delicious breakfast option, this recipe transforms classic ingredients into a healthy masterpiece. With rolled oats, sugar-free whole wheat bread, and the natural sweetness of honey, this toast is not just a treat to your taste buds but also a step towards a healthier lifestyle. Ideal for anyone embracing health-conscious dining without compromising on taste.
recipeIngredient: 4 slice (40g), Sugar Free 100% Whole Wheat Bread

recipeInstructions.text: In a small bowl, beat the eggs thoroughly.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 2

recipeInstructions.text: In another bowl, mix the rolled oats with the beaten eggs until well combined.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 3

recipeInstructions.text: Lay the sugar-free whole wheat bread slices on a baking tray.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 4

recipeInstructions.text: Spread the oats and egg mixture evenly over the bread slices.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 5

recipeInstructions.text: Drizzle honey over each bread slice.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 6

recipeInstructions.text: Bake in the preheated oven for 15 minutes, or until the topping is golden brown and slightly crisp.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 7
